characters: Driver of a black sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road at night. The road is well-lit with several vehicles ahead and pedestrians on the sidewalks. A cyclist is seen on the left side of the road, moving forward. The black sedan ahead is moving slowly, and there is a potential for sudden movements from the cyclist or the sedan.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while keeping a safe distance from the black sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the cyclist on the left side to avoid any sudden movements.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 2 meters away, moving forward. 2) Front: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly.

characters: Group of people on the road
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching a group of people on the road. The group includes individuals sitting and standing around a fallen motorcycle. The situation appears to be an accident scene, with people attending to the fallen motorcycle and possibly injured individuals.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down as it approaches the accident scene. The vehicles speed is gradually decreasing to ensure safety and avoid any collision with the people on the road.
key_objects: 1) Front: A group of people, approximately 10 meters away, attending to a fallen motorcycle, blocking the road. 2) Left side: A person standing, approximately 12 meters away, observing the scene. 3) Right side: A person sitting, approximately 8 meters away, near the fallen motorcycle.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a highway. Initially, there is a blue sedan on the right side, and a truck ahead in the same lane. Over the next few seconds, the blue sedan accelerates and overtakes the self-driving vehicle from the right side. The truck remains in front of the self-driving vehicle, maintaining a consistent distance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position throughout the segment. The vehicle does not change lanes or speed significantly, indicating a routine driving scenario.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A blue sedan, approximately 5 meters away, accelerating and overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: A truck, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed and distance.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a highway. Initially, a large green truck is seen on the right side, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle. As the vehicle progresses, the truck moves ahead, and the road ahead is clear with a few vehicles visible in the distance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while traveling on the highway. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the truck on the right side and other vehicles ahead.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A large green truck, approximately 2 meters away, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: Several vehicles, approximately 50 meters away, moving in the same direction.
